metadata.title: CVE-2018-19891 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: An invalid memory address dereference was discovered in the huffcode function (libfaac/huff2.c) in Freeware Advanced Audio Coder (FAAC) 1.29.9.2. The vulnerability causes a segmentation fault and application crash, which leads to denial of service in the book 10 case.

criterions.comment: faac package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.30-1').
